title: "About Me"

I'm an ecosystem health professional dedicated to leadership at the intersection of science and decision making. Got an infectious disease, invasive species, wildlife or fisheries management problem? Let's chat!

Current Position: Postdoctoral Associate in the [DiRenzo Lab](https://grazielladirenzo.weebly.com/lab-members.html), University of Massachusetts Amherst and Massachusetts Cooperative Fish and Wildlife Research Unit

Visiting Scientist with the United States Geological Survey, [Disease Decision Analysis and Research](https://www.usgs.gov/centers/eesc/disease-decision-analysis-and-research) team
